unit_rules.name: Tyrant of Badab
unit_rules.text: While this model is leading a unit, its +Bodyguard+ modes have +1 to their Objective Control trait.

unit_rules.name: Red Corsairs
unit_rules.text: At the start of the battle, you may select up to three +Infantry+ units, and re-deploy them or place them into Reserves.

unit_rules.name: Hamadrya's Knowledge
unit_rules.text: When an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance, or Fall Back move within 9" of this model's unit, you may destroy the Hamadrya token. If you do, and this model's unit is not in Melee Distance, this unit may make a Normal move up to d6".
